Who is
Chidubem Ovbiebo?

Chidubem is a software engineer who enjoys building clean APIs, fast systems, and tools that (ideally) don’t break in the middle of the night. He works mostly on backend services and infrastructure, and occasionally gets dragged into frontend work—with minimal complaining.

Does he share any articles online?

Occassionally. Lately, he’s been writing about distributed systems. Recent posts include deep dives into logical clocks, and synchronizing distributed systems.

How can people contact him?
